Bisnius Stephens, 1829a: 23
(species included:
cephalotes
and four unavailable names; [ Note: The same questions and controversy concerning the authorship and date of publication for
Philonthus
apply to
Bisnius
. The issue is discussed in my “note” attached to the citation of the original description for
Philonthus
]).
TYPE SPECIES:
Staphylinus cephalotes Gravenhorst
, fixed by monotypy.
— Mulsant and Rey, 1876: 583 [= 1877: 439] (characters; key to French species).
— Heyden, Reitter, and Weise, 1891: 102 (list of species of Europe and Caucasus).

— Blackwelder, 1943: 399 (subgenus of
Philonthus
; type species:
cephalotes
).

— Tottenham, 1949: 372, 418 ( type species:
cephalotes Gravenhorst
; subgenus of
Philonthus
; checklist of British species).

— Smetana, 1995e: 513 (valid genus; characters; notes; key to North American species; transfer of Old World species to
Bisnius
; phylogenetic relationships).
— Lundgren, 1998: 50 (list of species from Florida ; records for other States listed for each species).
— Newton, Thayer, Ashe, and Chandler, 2000: 396 (34 Nearctic species; notes; characters in key).

Gefyrobius Thomson, 1859: 24
(species included:
nitidulus
).
TYPE SPECIES:
Staphylinus nitidulus Gravenhorst
, fixed by original designation and monotypy.

— Heyden, Reitter, and Weise, 1891: 104 (subgenus of
Philonthus
; list of species of Europe and Caucasus).

— Heyden, 1893: 43 (subgenus of
Philonthus
; list of species of Siberian region).

— Heyden, 1896: 33 (subgenus of
Philonthus
; list of species of Siberian region).

— Blackwelder, 1943: 399 (synonym of
Bisnius
; type species:
nitidulus
).

— Tottenham, 1949: 372 (synonym of
Bisnius
; type species:
denigrator Gravenhorst
=
nitidulus Gravenhorst
).

— Coiffait, 1974: 116, 120, 192 (subgenus of
Philonthus
; characters; key to species of western Palaearctic region).
